selected_skills.name: compare_chart_values
selected_skills.purpose: To compare the numerical values of Sky Blue and Web Maroon extracted from the chart.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the skill to determine if the value of Sky Blue is less than the value of Web Maroon.

new_skill_specs.name: map_comparison_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To map the result of a comparison to a multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: If comparison_result is not a boolean, handle gracefully.
